title: Expand product listings per category and add editorial category showcase section on homepage

requirements.text: Expand the products data in frontend/src/data/products.ts to include multiple individual products under each category: at least 3 products under Tufted Border Mirrors, at least 3 under Tufted Rugs, and at least 3 under Tufted Pillow Cases (and at least 2 under Tufted Mirror Rug). Each product should have a unique name, description, price, and reference a distinct product image. Update the ProductsPage and any category filtering/display logic to show all individual products per category.

quotes: can u show more products under each mirror , rug and pillow cases

acceptanceCriteria: At least 3 distinct products appear under Tufted Border Mirrors on the products listing page
At least 3 distinct products appear under Tufted Rugs on the products listing page
At least 3 distinct products appear under Tufted Pillow Cases on the products listing page
Each product card shows a unique name, image, and price
All new products link to their own product detail pages

requirements.text: Add a full-width editorial category showcase section on the homepage (Home.tsx), placed immediately below the 'OUR COLLECTION' product grid. The section should display three tall side-by-side panels in a 3-column layout, each panel filling with a large lifestyle/product background image, a bold editorial headline overlaid on the image (e.g., 'DEFINE YOUR SPACE' for Mirrors, 'GROUND YOUR ROOM' for Rugs, 'REST YOUR HEAD' for Pillows), and a minimal outlined CTA button centered in the panel linking to the relevant category. Style the layout consistent with the Bauhaus design system: uppercase bold typography, clean borders, and the brand color palette. This is directly inspired by the uploaded reference image showing three tall image panels with headlines and category buttons.

quotes: can u put something similiar to what is in the picture uploaded in home page under our collection area

acceptanceCriteria: A three-panel category showcase section renders on the homepage below the 'OUR COLLECTION' product grid
Each panel has a full-bleed background image, a bold uppercase editorial headline, and an outlined CTA button with the category name
Panels for Mirrors, Rugs, and Pillow Cases are all represented
CTA buttons navigate to the products page filtered to the relevant category
Layout is 3 columns on desktop and stacks to single column on mobile
Typography and colors follow the Bauhaus design system (uppercase, brand palette)

constraints: Do not modify any files under frontend/src/hooks/ or frontend/src/components/ui/
All product data must remain static in frontend/src/data/products.ts â€” no backend changes required
Maintain the existing Bauhaus design system (colors, typography, grid) throughout all new UI
nonGoals: Adding a real shopping cart or checkout functionality
Adding a new 'Poufs' product category (not part of the Blockhaus catalog)
Changing the existing hero, best seller, brand story, or marquee sections
